Headline: #92 Foster Temporary Reroute at Foster/Kimball
ShortDescription: 92 Foster buses are temporarily rerouted via Foster, Pulaski, Bryn Mawr and Kedzie: due to, street blockage near Foster/Kimball.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#92 Foster buses are temporarily rerouted via Foster, Pulaski, Bryn Mawr and Kedzie: due to, street blockage near Foster/Kimball.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #15 Jeffery Local and #J14 Jeffery Jump Temporary Reroute near Jeffery/93rd
ShortDescription: 15 Jeffery Local and J14 Jeffery Jump buses are temp. rerouted via Jeffery, 93rd, Stony Island, 87th, and Jeffery due to, street blockage near Jeffery/93rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#15 Jeffery Local and #J14 Jeffery Jump buses are temporarily rerouted via Jeffery, 93rd, Stony Island, 87th, and Jeffery due to, street blockage near Jeffery/93rd.

Headline: #J14 Jeffery Jump and #26 South Shore Express Temporary Southbound Reroute near Jeffery/Marquette
ShortDescription: Southbound J14 Jeffery Jump, 26 South Shore Express buses temp. rerouted via Lake Shore Drive, Hayes, Richards, Marquette, and Jeffery near Jeffery/Marquette.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound  #J14 Jeffery Jump and  #26 South Shore Express buses are temporarily  rerouted via Lake Shore Drive, Hayes, Richards, Marquette, and Jeffery due to street blockage near Jeffery/Marquette.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #57 Laramie Temporary Reroute at Laramie/Congress
ShortDescription: 57 Laramie buses are temporarily rerouted via Laramie, Jackson, Central, Harrison, Lexington, Cicero, and Laramie due to, street blockage at Laramie/Congress.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#57 Laramie buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Laramie, Jackson, Central, Harrison, Lexington, Cicero, and Laramie due to, street blockage at Laramie/Congress.

Allow extra travel time.
